Big B Cheering For Daughter Shweta As She Walks The Ramp Shows He's Just Like Our Dads!
Big B Cheering For Daughter Shweta As She Walks The Ramp Shows He's Just Like Our Dads!
Last evening, Bollywood celebrities including Sonam Kapoor, Karan Johar and Shweta Bachchan Nanda walked the walked the ramp for designers Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla at the Caring with Style show held in partnership with the Cancer Patients Aids Association.
Agencies
Karan showcased two looks at the ramp and Sonam stole the limelight donning a ivory chikankari lehenga. What made heads turn was her filmy twirl on the ramp to Kalank song, Ghar More Pardesiya.

But what's winning our hearts is how Big B was the most adorable Daddy! Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan were sitting at the front row as they cheered for their daughter Shweta who sported two ensembles - a bridal lehenga and a trademark Abu Sandeep chikankari creation for the ramp show. Have a look at the pictures and videos right here.
Just like any other father, Big B had his phone out and recorded the entire show while Shweta made them proud. After the show, Big B also posted an adorable message for Shweta. He took to Twitter to write:
T 3130 - Daughter's are THE best .. ! elegance grace and dignity ! ❤️❤️❤️❤️ you Shweta ..
अभी कल तक ही तो हम तुम्हें चलना सिखा रहे थे , और आज ये .. इतनी जल्दी समय कैसे निकल गया , बस पता ही नहीं चला pic.twitter.com/tBQddBlxOO — Amitabh Bachchan (@SrBachchan) March 24, 2019
Well, Daddies are indeed the best and this proves that no matter how old you grow up, your father will continue to root and cheer for you!
